name: Set of 'London' Badges
description:
A delightful set of 6 badges depicting the most popular and fun individual illustrated elements from Alice Tait's 'Map of London'.

These look particularly good on jackets, bags and pencilcases.

Badge designs: Union Jack, Routemaster Bus, 3 Queen's Guards, Crown, Coronet Teapot, 'I love London baby!'

Ideal as a little gift or London memento, the fun style of these badges bring a smile to the receiver.

Each design is taken from an illustrative detail off Alice Tait's 'Map of London' - see the full art Print for more details.

Made from:
Laminated paper and metal pin.

Dimensions:
25mm Diameter

name: 'London' Stickers
description:
A delightful set of stickers depicting details from Alice Tait's 'Map of London', for personalising your stationery.

These look particularly good on letters and postcards.

Ideal as a little gift or London memento, the fun style of these stickers bring a smile to the receiver.

Each design is taken from an illustrative detail off Alice Tait's 'Map of London' - see the full art Print for more details.

Made from:
adhesive and plasticised paper

Dimensions:
36 stickers of varying sizes.

name: Enamel 'London' Badge
description:
A delightful enamel badge depicting the Crown detail from Alice Tait's 'Map of London'.

These look particularly good on jackets and bags.

Ideal as a little gift or London memento, the fun style of these badges bring a smile to the receiver.

Each design is taken from an illustrative detail off Alice Tait's 'Map of London' - see the full art Print for more details.

Made from:
enamel with metal pin.

Dimensions:
2cm x 2cm

name: 'Map of London' Apron
description:
Alice Tait's popular 'Map of London' design printed onto a quality 100% cotton apron, with signature pale blue colour cotton ties. 

A personal and fun addition to any British kitchen.

A quality accessory which contributes to the Alice Tait London range.

Makes a great gift for relatives, friends or colleagues who like to cook.

Kitchen accessories in the same range: apron, tea towel, mug, shopping bag, keyring, fridge magnet, badges, stickers.

Made from:
100% Cotton. Thick weave, excellent quality. Machine washable.

Dimensions:
70cm x 80cm

name: 'Map of London' Tea Towel
description:
Alice Tait's popular 'Map of London' design printed onto a 100% cotton, quality tea towel.

A personal and fun addition to any British kitchen.

A quality accessory which contributes to the Alice Tait London range.

Makes a great gift for relatives, friends or colleagues who like to cook.

Kitchen accessories in the same range: apron, tea towel, mug, shopping bag, keyring, fridge magnet, badges, stickers.

Made from:
100% Cotton. Machine washable.

Dimensions:
73cm x 50cm

name: 'Map of London' Mug
description:
We British love our tea, and what better way to enjoy it, than sipped from a specially illustrated London mug.

The London Mug makes a great gift for a relative, friend or colleague, or as a souvenir.

Features 3 Queen's Guards inside the mug.

The illustration is Alice Tait's 'Map of London'. See the 'Map of London' Print for full, drawn details.

Dishwasher-safe.

Presented in a pale blue, branded gift box, with ribboned tag.
Made from:

White Porcelain.

Dimensions:
H112mm x W72mm x 120mm including handle

name: 'I Love London' Keyring
description:
A fun keyring for any patriotic Brit fan.

Give this as a gift to friends who love London, or keep it for your own set of keys.

A large keyring, with enamel face in white and red.

This accessory complements the Alice Tait 'London' range.

We also have a range of kitchen accessories and prints.

This artwork is also seen on the sticker set and badges.

Made from:
nickel and enamel

Dimensions:
35mm diameter. 95mm full length incl chain. 
Super heavy duty keyring.

name: Map of London
description:
Size A3, 297mm x 420mm.

Individually Signed Lithographic Print

As you are buying directly from the artist these prints can be personalised with a unique message of your choice, such as 'To Katie with love' or 'Happy Birthday Dad!'. 

All prints come unframed in a clear plastic presentation sleeve, rolled in a postal tube.

(If you would like to personalise your print at no extra cost just drop us an email with your message when you have made your purchase, up to 25 characters long. The message will be written in pencil in small handwriting along the bottom of the print.)

For delivery details please refer to the 'Post and Packing' section of this site. If you are buying this as a gift you might like to consider upgrading to our flat packed option. See 'postage and packaging' section for more details.

name: 'Early Spring Day' Screen Print
description:
6 colour screen print
Limited edition of 50
The image size is roughly 30 X30cm, on paper size 42 X 46.5cm.

Alice created this drawing in March this year on a trip to Paris. Originally working in pencil and wash pen, she sat in front of the Eiffel tower with her sketchbook. This piece captures the sheer joy of early spring blossoming trees, the fresh breezy skies and locals stepping out to enjoy one of the first warm days of the year.  

The print comes unframed, and will be rolled and sent special delivery, price includes free postage worldwide!

name: Watercolour People Greetings Card Set X 6
description:
Delight your friends and family with these stylish card designs.

A set of six comprises of two of each design. Blank inside.

The cards are wrapped in cellophane, and will be posted Royal Mail in a sturdy protective envelope.

For delivery details please refer to the 'Post and Packing' section of this site.

name: Large Illustrated World Map 84.1 x 59.4 cm
description:
Look for a world of detail in this lively piece of art!

As you are buying directly from the artist this print can be personalised with a unique message of your choice, such as 'Tommy's World' or 'Happy Birthday Dad!'. 

The print will be supplied rolled in white tissue paper, and posted in a sturdy cardboard postal tube.

The print will be sent out special delivery, £10 on top of the order total.

(If you would like to personalise your print at no extra cost just drop us an email with your message when you have made your purchase, up to 25 characters long. The message will be written in pencil in small handwriting along the bottom of the print.)

This large map is A1, 841 x 594mm

It is digitally printed on high quality paper and hand signed by Alice Tait.

name: London Shopfronts Greetings Cards Set
description:
Welcome to London! 

This set of six designs illustrates some of London's best loved shops. Look out for the little dog in each card, and lots of other fun details your friends and family can enjoy.

The cards are individually wrapped in cellophane, and will be posted Royal Mail in a sturdy protective envelope. Blank inside.

For delivery details please refer to the 'Post and Packing' section of this site.

name: Still Life with Quinces
description:
Still Life With Quinces. 

One of a series of nine illustrations commissioned by the Folio Society for Jane Grigson's recipe book, 'Good Things'.

The artwork is from a limited edition of 50 Giclee print run, on premium quality paper. Size 260 x 356 mm. It is hand signed, titled and numbered.

As this is a premium print it is delivered Special Delivery to UK addresses, which is £6.00 on top of the order total. 

Prints to addresses outside the UK are posted Airsure, which is a fast and fully trackable service, and is £15 on top of the order total.

name: Special Delivery for UK
description:
If you would like a more secure form of delivery for a UK address, Special Delivery is guarenteed delivery and is trackable online. 

Add this to your cart and your delivery will be upgraded to Special Delivery.

£4.00 will be added to the £3.50 standard postage on all UK orders.

name: Flat packed postal option
description: If you are giving an A3 (£19 print) print as a gift, you might like to consider having it delivered flat packed with a backing board inside the cellophane. The backing board sits behind the print, keeping it stiff so that you can wrap it as a gift, or present it without worrying about it getting bent.
